render.notes: The timeline effect is achieved using a flex layout where the left column holds the date markers and the right column holds the cards. A pseudo-element or absolute div creates the vertical line connecting them. Images are simulated with CSS gradients and emoji overlays to match the visual weight of the original screenshot.
